      Parameters:
      username - the username of the client
      password - the password of the client
      name - the name of the client
      isVIP - is the user VIP
      taxNumber - the taxNumber of the client
      shoppingCart - the shopping cart of the client
      wishlist - the wishlist for the client
      orders - the orders of the client
